description: Main application source file implementing a Flutter-based TV interface with custom focus navigation, media item models, UI components for carousel, profiles, and navigation.

classes.name: MediaItem
classes.description: Represents a media item with title, image URL, and optional tags.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main stateful widget managing TV interface layout, navigation, focus, and overlay panels.

classes.name: _FeaturedRow
classes.description: Displays a carousel of focusable media cards with a metadata panel.

classes.name: _FeaturedCard
classes.description: A focusable media poster card with hover effects and focus rings.

classes.name: _RightMetadataPanel
classes.description: Displays detailed media info and action buttons related to a media item.

classes.name: _ProfileOverlay
classes.description: Slide-in profile panel overlay with focusable menu items.

classes.name: _ProfileMenuItem
classes.description: Focusable menu item within the profile overlay.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, runs the TvApp widget.

methods.name: _handleDirectionalFocus
methods.description: Handles focus traversal in response to D-pad arrow key inputs.
